experience.title: Manager
experience.description: Relationship Manager- Medium Enterprises Banking* Sourcing new relationships for the bank in both asset and liability for mid-market segment (companies in turnover range of INR 100-500 crore). Won awards in the first year of joining for new business generation.* Managing a portfolio of existing relationship cycle including client meetings, structuring transactions, preparation of annual proposals and reviewing credit appraisal memorandums, defining security structure, framing financial covenants, disbursement and relationship management* Industry research & scoping, undertaking detailed credit risk appraisal, Internal Credit rating, preparation of appraisal notes in consonance with the corporate credit policy and making suitable recommendations to the sanctioning authorities* Research using SaveRisk and CRISIL rating rationales* As an additional responsibility, involved in coordination with various departments for generation and implementation of process changes and system implementation for the commercial banking team on Pan India basis

experience.title: Article Assistant
experience.description: 1) Conducted Statutory and Tax Audits of Private Limited Companies in the Service and Hospitality Industry.2) Conducted Tax Audits of Individuals and Partnership Firms.3) Compliance of Regulations of Bombay Public Trust Act 1950 and Audit of Charitable Trusts.4) Internship Included assisting and eventually leading the process of preparation of Financial Statements and ensuring Compliance with Companies Act 1956 , Companies Act 2013 and Income Tax Act 1961.
